name: Bone Investiture
summary: You encase yourself in spiritual dinosaur bones to become a Huge dinosaur.
description:
You encase yourself in spiritual dinosaur bones to become a Huge dinosaur. You can cast dinosaur form on yourself as a 5th-level primal innate spell once per day.Traits

Lizardfolk: These reptilian humanoids, also known as iruxi, are extremely adaptable and patient.
